description: 共同科英文（一）課程為一學年課程，每學期兩學分，係為非英語系學生所開設的課程。目標在幫助大一學生活用中學時期所累積的英語知識，提昇英語聽、說、讀、寫整體的溝通能力。為達此目標，本課程要求教師盡量用英語上課，努力營造一個豐富的英語環境，讓學生不但有充分機會以英語參與課堂活動，且樂於使用英語與同學及老師溝通。
goals: 增進學生英語溝通表達能力
透過參與課程活動促進團隊精神
透過多面向英語閱讀促使學生了解多元文化，拓展學生國際化視野
透過課堂討論培養批判精神
提升學生英語學習動機及自主學習興趣
syllabus:
Ø  **Course description**

This course aims to improve students’English proficiency by equipping them with intensive training in four skills. Inthis course, there will be a range of activities which engage students incontemporary topics with practical issues, sharpen their critical thinking, andboost their communicative abilities. They also learn to teamwork with theirpeers and to become more autonomous learners.

Ø  **Course objectives:**

The course is designed to

1)     Develop students’ skills inEnglish

2)     Enhance students’ knowledge ofvocabulary and grammar

3)     Build students’ confidence incommunication in English

4)     Develop students’ teamwork andautonomy

5)     Broaden cultural andintercultural knowledge

  

Ø  Grading policy and course requirements

v  Grading policy

1)     Attendance and participation:10%

2)     In-class quizzes and assignments:20%

3)     Lexile test: 10%

4)     Mid-term test: 20%

5)     Final test: 40%

v  Course requirements:

·        _Attendance and participation (10%)_

Class attendance is required and strictlychecked. Students are expected to come to class every week, except for (a)hospitalized cases; or (b) emergencies; or (c) authorized absences. For theseexceptions, evidence with the signature and stamp of the person in charge mustbe provided. For example, for hospitalized cases, a medical form that provesthe student was hospitalized with the signature of the doctor and/or medicalstaff with his/her stamp must be submitted. Any absences apart from theexceptions mentioned above are counted, and each absence results in _1 point_ deducted in theattendance/participation score.

·        _In-class quizzes and assignments (20%)_

Students are expected to submit their assignmentsbefore the due date. Late submissions will result in 30% deduction in the scorefor quizzes and assignments. A submission which is received 2 days or laterthan due date will be instantly marked zero. If there is an emergency happeningon the due date, students should email the lecturer as soon as possible.In-class quizzes are also required and counted towards the grade.

·        _Lexile test (10%)_

Students are required to take the Lexiletest. This test will place from October 7 to November 8.

·        _Mid-term test (20%) and final test (40%)_

These two tests will be conducted in classand will account for the aforementioned percentage.

For the mid-term test, students will workin groups of three or four and will present on an assigned topic.

For the final test, students will workindividually and will write an essay on a given topic. Their work will bemarked based on the [IELTSWriting Task 2 band descriptors](https://www.ielts.org/-/media/pdfs/writing-band-descriptors-task-2.ashx?la=en), including 4 criteria: Task Response,Coherence & Cohesion, Vocabulary, and Grammar.
